title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 147 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 147 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华，因歌颂我们的神为善为美。赞美的话是合宜的。

lineList.en: The LORD doth build up Jerusalem: he gathereth together the outcasts of Israel.
lineList.cn: 耶和华建造耶路撒冷，聚集以色列中被赶散的人。

lineList.en: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
lineList.cn: 他医好伤心的人，裹好他们的伤处。

lineList.en: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.
lineList.cn: 他数点星宿的数目，一一称它的名。

lineList.en: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.
lineList.cn: 我们的主为大，最有能力。他的智慧无法测度。

lineList.en: The LORD lifteth up the meek: he casteth the wicked down to the ground.
lineList.cn: 耶和华扶持谦卑人，将恶人倾覆于地。

lineList.en: Sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:
lineList.cn: 你们要以感谢向耶和华歌唱，用琴向我们的神歌颂。

lineList.en: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, who prepareth rain for the earth, who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains.
lineList.cn: 他用云遮天，为地降雨，使草生长在山上。

lineList.en: He giveth to the beast his food, and to the young ravens which cry.
lineList.cn: 他赐食给走兽，和啼叫的小乌鸦。

lineList.en: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse: he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man.
lineList.cn: 他不喜悦马的力大，不喜爱人的腿快。

lineList.en: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
lineList.cn: 耶和华喜爱敬畏他和盼望他慈爱的人。

lineList.en: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem; praise thy God, O Zion.
lineList.cn: 耶路撒冷阿，你要颂赞耶和华。锡安哪，你要赞美你的神。

lineList.en: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates; he hath blessed thy children within thee.
lineList.cn: 因为他坚固了你的门闩，赐福给你中间的儿女。

lineList.en: He maketh peace in thy borders, and filleth thee with the finest of the wheat.
lineList.cn: 他使你境内平安。用上好的麦子使你满足。

lineList.en: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth: his word runneth very swiftly.
lineList.cn: 他发命在地。他的话颁行最快。

lineList.en: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.
lineList.cn: 他降雪如羊毛，撒霜如炉灰。

lineList.en: He casteth forth his ice like morsels: who can stand before his cold?
lineList.cn: 他掷下冰雹如碎渣。他发出寒冷，谁能当得起呢。

lineList.en: He sendeth out his word, and melteth them: he causeth his wind to blow, and the waters flow.
lineList.cn: 他一出令，这些就都消化。他使风刮起，水便流动。

lineList.en: He sheweth his word unto Jacob, his statutes and his judgments unto Israel.
lineList.cn: 他将他的道指示雅各，将他的律例典章指示以色列。

lineList.en: He hath not dealt so with any nation: and as for his judgments, they have not known them. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 别国他都没有这样待过。至于他的典章，他们向来没有知道。你们要赞美耶和华。
